resources.string: This accessibility service lets the app detect when the screen turns on so it can perform a short background action when you open the phone. The service does not read personal content. it only observes system window changes and screen state.

This accessibility service needs accessibility access so it can detect when you open the phone and perform a short background action. The service only observes system window and screen state events — it does not read or transmit your notifications, messages, keystrokes, or other personal content. You can disable this at any time in Settings → Accessibility.
